lines.text:
[In court]
I wanna be back in prison. I don't care what the sentence is. I'm already on death row, I'm gonna see the chair, I don't... this is all re-electional purposes. This is not for nothing but to get you guys re-elected. And this is a bunch of bull-shit. This doesn't even need to happen. I'm trying to save tax payers money; you people don't care. You wanna press on with a jury and everything else to try to impress the public. And all I wanna do is go back to prison, wait for the chair, and get the hell off of this planet that's full of evil and your corruption in these courtrooms.
You don't have any of those secret cameras on your belt, do you?
No, I just have this rather large one right here.
